Trigger You critically hit a creature that is not on its home plane.

Requirements You have a banishment spell prepared

The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane. You expend a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Banishment]{Banishment} spell you have prepared, affecting the creature you critically hit without needing to cast the spell. The creature can attempt to resist the spell as normal.
